articles.title: Ukraine attacks Russian aircraft in far-reaching drone strikes - The Washington Post
Red Cross says at least 21 killed and dozens shot in Gaza aid incident - BBC
articles.summary: Red Cross says at least 21 killed and dozens shot in Gaza aid incident Bodies were brought to Nasser hospital after the incident A "mass casualty influx" of people, many with gunshot or shrapnel wounds, was received at a Red Cross field hospital in southern Gaza, the organisation said, following disputed reports about an incident near an aid distribution centre...
